channel.title: PodPudding
channel.description: PodPudding® is a Podcast devoted to finding and promoting new, unsigned rock acts. Some may be in your neighbourhood, some way across the world. If you're in a Rock / Pop act , or, know of one that would like "air time", send along your demos to "podpudding@gmail.com". Also, visit www.podpudding.com for info on exactly how and what to send and other cool stuff. ENJOY THE SHOW!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Rockin' The Bandwidth!
channel.itunes:author: ash d
channel.itunes:summary: PodPudding® is a Podcast devoted to finding and promoting new, unsigned rock acts. Some may be in your neighbourhood, some way across the world. If you're in a Rock / Pop act , or, know of one that would like "air time", send along your demos to "podpudding@gmail.com". Also, visit www.podpudding.com for info on exactly how and what to send and other cool stuff. ENJOY THE SHOW!

item.title: #9, #9, #9...It's The PodPudding Show!
item.description: Greetings, childern of Earth and welcome to Show #9, #9, #9... Do we ever have a rocking show for your ears today. Unlike past shows where we have one featured band and a Sneak Leak artist,or two, today we have two featured bands PLUS a Sneak Leak artist! There's a lot of good music here so, let's get going... The Play List: Let 'Em Go - Tangle Tangle - Tangle Not With Me - Tangle Wrap The World Around Your Eyes- Tangle Descent - Jupiter Crash The Beginning Of The End - Jupiter Crash Sinners & Losers -Jupiter Crash Chaos Mind - Jupiter Crash Through The Music - Rock Justice/Ivan Smirnov Do let us know what you think of Show 9 and the artists featured. Your comments and suggestions are always welcome. If you're an unsigned/indie Rock/Pop act send us your music along with a short bio. to "podpudding@gmail.com". Also, feel free to leave a comment right here. Cheers!
item.dc:creator: ash d
item.itunes:summary:
Greetings, childern of Earth and welcome to Show #9, #9, #9...
Do we ever have a rocking show for your ears today. Unlike past shows where we have one featured band and a Sneak Leak artist,or two, today we have two featured bands PLUS a Sneak Leak artist! There's a lot of good music here so, let's get going...
The Play List:
Let 'Em Go - Tangle
Tangle - Tangle
Not With Me - Tangle
Wrap The World Around Your Eyes- Tangle
Descent - Jupiter Crash
The Beginning Of The End - Jupiter Crash
Sinners & Losers -Jupiter Crash
Chaos Mind - Jupiter Crash
Through The Music - Rock Justice/Ivan Smirnov
Do let us know what you think of Show 9 and the artists featured. Your comments and suggestions are always welcome. If you're an unsigned/indie Rock/Pop act send us your music along with a short bio. to "podpudding@gmail.com". Also, feel free to leave a comment right here.
Cheers!

item.title: PodPudding Show 8 :P
item.description: And here we are at Show 8! We've got some great music in store for you. Today's featured act are Park Police, a trio with a straight forward, no nonsense rock approach to their song writing. Check them out at www.park-police.com Instead of one Sneak Leak artist, we decided to treat you to two great acts. The first is known as Jupiter Crash and the second is a band called Head. Both are hard rockin' bands that leave you wanting more. Lastly, we've been given another "pre-master" song by our dear friend Raven. It continues in his tradition of Native American compositions with a song called Cedars Forever. Thank you, Raven! Here's the play list: Down With Control - Park Police Nation Wide - Park Police Reflex - Park Police Mission Song - Park Police Dark Surprise - Jupiter Crash Harder To Fine - Head Cedars Forever - Raven Lead out song is "To My Father" by Raven. As always, we hope you've enjoyed our show and welcome your comments and suggestion. Also, remember if you're an indie, or, unsigned act send us your music, bio and contact information to "podpudding@gmail.com". Thank you for listening!
item.dc:creator: ash d
item.itunes:summary:
And here we are at Show 8! We've got some great music in store for you.
Today's featured act are Park Police, a trio with a straight forward, no nonsense rock approach to their song writing. Check them out at www.park-police.com
Instead of one Sneak Leak artist, we decided to treat you to two great acts. The first is known as Jupiter Crash and the second is a band called Head. Both are hard rockin' bands that leave you wanting more.
Lastly, we've been given another "pre-master" song by our dear friend Raven. It continues in his tradition of Native American compositions with a song called Cedars Forever. Thank you, Raven!
Here's the play list:
Down With Control - Park Police
Nation Wide - Park Police
Reflex - Park Police
Mission Song - Park Police
Dark Surprise - Jupiter Crash
Harder To Fine - Head
Cedars Forever - Raven
Lead out song is "To My Father" by Raven.
As always, we hope you've enjoyed our show and welcome your comments and suggestion. Also, remember if you're an indie, or, unsigned act send us your music, bio and contact information to "podpudding@gmail.com".
Thank you for listening!

item.title: PodPudding Show 7
item.description: Yes, it's been a while, but so worth the wait! Here's Show 7 for the whole world to relish. The featured artist is Dylan Donkin ( www.dylandonkin.com & www.myspace.com/dylandonkin ) of the U.S along with a 'sneak leak' of a band from Show 8 currently in production named Park Police also from the U.S. Though difficult to actually categorize, Dylan's music appears to have derived influences ranging from Radiohead, Jeff Buckley, Elliot Smith and the Beatles. Yet, it's a copy of none. His music stands on it's own. We've been lucky to have received an advance copy of his EP titled "Food For Thoughtlessness" and we're playing it in it's entirety for you. Here's the play list: 1) Diatom Blues - Dylan Donkin 2) Make A Choice - Dylan Donkin 3) The Commonaut - Dylan Donkin 4) Mission Song - Park Police 5) Fall Through The Wall - Dylan Donkin 6) Yolk - Dylan Donkin And the lead out song ( which was initially featured on PodPudding Show 1 ) is "Open Skies" by Parikrima from India. Thank you for listening. Please do leave us your suggestion & comments ( and may be even praises!?!) at "podpudding@gmail.com", or, right here in the comments section. To make a donation please click on the Pay Pal button.
item.dc:creator: ash d
item.itunes:summary:
Yes, it's been a while, but so worth the wait! Here's Show 7 for the whole world to relish. The featured artist is Dylan Donkin ( www.dylandonkin.com & www.myspace.com/dylandonkin ) of the U.S along with a 'sneak leak' of a band from Show 8 currently in production named Park Police also from the U.S.
Though difficult to actually categorize, Dylan's music appears to have derived influences ranging from Radiohead, Jeff Buckley, Elliot Smith and the Beatles. Yet, it's a copy of none. His music stands on it's own. We've been lucky to have received an advance copy of his EP titled "Food For Thoughtlessness" and we're playing it in it's entirety for you. Here's the play list:
1) Diatom Blues - Dylan Donkin
2) Make A Choice - Dylan Donkin
3) The Commonaut - Dylan Donkin
4) Mission Song - Park Police
5) Fall Through The Wall - Dylan Donkin
6) Yolk - Dylan Donkin
And the lead out song ( which was initially featured on PodPudding Show 1 ) is "Open Skies" by Parikrima from India.
Thank you for listening. Please do leave us your suggestion & comments ( and may be even praises!?!) at "podpudding@gmail.com", or, right here in the comments section. To make a donation please click on the Pay Pal button.

item.title: PodPudding Show SIX!! Yes 6 :)
item.description: Greetings everyone and thanks for being with us here at PodPudding once again. As always we've got some great music for you thanks to Reaxis ( "www.myspace.com/reaxis") and Raven ( www.ravenfx.com). Here's today's playlist: Reaxis: Morning Star, Finer Anarchy Raven: Tribe After Tribe Reaxis: Silhouette Me We extend our gratitude to both of these fine acts for sending us their music. If you're a rock/ pop act and would like to be featured on PodPudding all you need do is send us your songs in either mp3, or, .wav files along with a short bio. Lastly, thank you Billy Preston.
item.dc:creator: ash d
item.itunes:summary:
Greetings everyone and thanks for being with us here at PodPudding once again. As always we've got some great music for you thanks to Reaxis ( "www.myspace.com/reaxis") and Raven ( www.ravenfx.com).
Here's today's playlist:
Reaxis: Morning Star, Finer Anarchy
Raven: Tribe After Tribe
Reaxis: Silhouette Me
We extend our gratitude to both of these fine acts for sending us their music. If you're a rock/ pop act and would like to be featured on PodPudding all you need do is send us your songs in either mp3, or, .wav files along with a short bio.
Lastly, thank you Billy Preston.

item.title: PodPudding Show 5
item.description: Welcome to the 5th show of PodPudding. It's been a very rewarding experience doing these shows and the best part is we've only begun! Along the way we've been making some great friends and have discovered some fantastic music. A great example of that are the acts we've featured in this show. In fact, we had a difficult time choosing which of their tunes to not put on. After recording the whole show, we went back, edited it and put in another song from Menwhopause which originally had been excluded. Though this decision resulted in a longer show, we felt it was the right choice. Here's the playlist: Menwhopause ( "www.menwhopause.com" ) : Flyaway, Traveling Blues James Starbuck : ( "www.jamessarbuck.com" ) : Thank you Menwhopause : The Story Begins, Father Monologue To all unsigned / indie rock bands out there, keep sending us your music and demo packages so that we may feature YOU! For more info, please check out our site at "www.freewebs.com/podpudding". Our e-mail is "podpudding@gmail.com". Thanks for listening!!!
item.dc:creator: ash d
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome to the 5th show of PodPudding. It's been a very rewarding experience doing these shows and the best part is we've only begun! Along the way we've been making some great friends and have discovered some fantastic music. A great example of that are the acts we've featured in this show. In fact, we had a difficult time choosing which of their tunes to not put on. After recording the whole show, we went back, edited it and put in another song from Menwhopause which originally had been excluded. Though this decision resulted in a longer show, we felt it was the right choice.
Here's the playlist:

James Starbuck : ( "www.jamessarbuck.com" ) : Thank you
Menwhopause : The Story Begins, Father Monologue
To all unsigned / indie rock bands out there, keep sending us your music and demo packages so that we may feature YOU! For more info, please check out our site at "www.freewebs.com/podpudding". Our e-mail is "podpudding@gmail.com".
Thanks for listening!!!

item.title: PodPudding Show 4, yes, Show 4!!
item.description: PodPudding® is a Podcast devoted to finding and promoting new, unsigned rock acts. Some may be in your neighbourhood, some way across the world. If you're in a Rock / Pop act , or, know of one that would like "air time", send along your demos to "podpudding@gmail.com". Also, visit "www.freewebs.com/podpudding" for info on exactly how and what to send and other cool stuff. ENJOY THE SHOW! Oh yes... PLEASE leave your comments! We'd love to hear from you, and SEND US YOUR DEMOs!!!
